results.content:
I've probably seen more than 100 tutorials with different topics so far, but this is the first one that worked so smoothly (although the topic wasn't that trivial). Everything - really everything - worked the first time (however, you should know the handling of VIM :-)).
Overall, I highly recommend to take this course, which has really helped me a lot.
PS: Sure, you could complain about the small font in the terminal, whereby I think: "If you want to find something to complain in a tutorial, then you will find it".

response.content:
Hi Markus, thank you very much for your comment.
I promise I will improve my VIM skills :)
